title: Number of visitors to the Mount Rushmore National Memorial in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: Mount Rushmore National Memorial Park in the Memorial attracted a total of approximately 1.96 millions visitors in 2019 , down from its visitation peak of 2.44 millions in 2017 .
A Mount Rushmore National Memorial uniting nations Mount Rushmore National Memorial Park 's name derived from the many glaciers that shaped its topography for over 2.43 millions years .

Located in Montana on the Canada-U.S. border , Mount Rushmore National Memorial Park is the second half of the Glacier-Waterton International Peace Mount Rushmore National Memorial , the first half being Waterton Lakes Mount Rushmore National Memorial in Canada .
